00003 def detect(env):
00004         import os, sys
00005         import SCons.Util
00006 
00007         if env['ARGS'].get('debug', None):
00008                 env['BKS_DEBUG'] = env['ARGS'].get('debug', None)
00009                 env.pprint('CYAN','** Enabling debug for the project **')
00010                 env['GENCXXFLAGS'] = ['-g']
00011                 env['GENCCFLAGS'] = ['-g']
00012                 env['GENLINKFLAGS'] = ['-g']
00013         else:
00014                 env['GENCXXFLAGS'] = ['-O2', '-DNDEBUG', '-DNO_DEBUG']
00015                 env['GENCCFLAGS'] = ['-O2', '-DNDEBUG', '-DNO_DEBUG']
00016                 env['GENLINKFLAGS'] = []
00017         
00018         if os.environ.has_key('CXXFLAGS'):  env['GENCXXFLAGS']  += SCons.Util.CLVar( os.environ['CXXFLAGS'] )
00019         if os.environ.has_key('CFLAGS'): env['GENCCFLAGS'] = SCons.Util.CLVar( os.environ['CFLAGS'] )
00020         if os.environ.has_key('LINKFLAGS'): env['GENLINKFLAGS'] += SCons.Util.CLVar( os.environ['LINKFLAGS'] )
00021         # for make compatibility 
00022         if os.environ.has_key('LDFLAGS'):   env['GENLINKFLAGS'] += SCons.Util.CLVar( os.environ['LDFLAGS'] )
00023 
00024         ## Mac OS X settings
00025         if sys.platform == 'darwin':
00026                 env['GENCXXFLAGS'] += ['-fno-common']
00027                 #env['GENLINKFLAGS'] += ['-undefined', 'dynamic_lookup']
00028 
00029         ## Linux settings
00030         if sys.platform == 'linux2':
00031                 env['GENCXXFLAGS'] += ['-D_XOPEN_SOURCE=500', '-D_BSD_SOURCE', '-D_GNU_SOURCE']
00032 
00033         ## FreeBSD settings (contributed by will at freebsd dot org)
00034         if os.uname()[0] == "FreeBSD":
00035                 if os.environ.has_key('PTHREAD_LIBS'):
00036                         env.AppendUnique( GENLINKFLAGS = SCons.Util.CLVar( os.environ['PTHREAD_LIBS'] ) )
00037                 else:
00038                         syspf = os.popen('/sbin/sysctl kern.osreldate')
00039                         osreldate = int(syspf.read().split()[1])
00040                         syspf.close()
00041                         if osreldate < 500016:
00042                                 env.AppendUnique( GENLINKFLAGS = ['-pthread'])
00043                                 env.AppendUnique( GENCXXFLAGS = ['-D_THREAD_SAFE'])
00044                         elif osreldate < 502102:
00045                                 env.AppendUnique( GENLINKFLAGS = ['-lc_r'])
00046                                 env.AppendUnique( GENCXXFLAGS = ['-D_THREAD_SAFE'])
00047                         else:
00048                                 env.AppendUnique( GENLINKFLAGS = ['-pthread'])
00049 
00050                 env.AppendUnique( GENLINKFLAGS = ['-L/usr/local/lib', '-L/usr/X11R6/lib'] )
00051                 env.AppendUnique( GENCXXFLAGS = ['-I/usr/local/include', '-I/usr/X11R6/include'] )
00052 
00053         # User-specified prefix
00054         if env['ARGS'].has_key('prefix'):
00055                 env['PREFIX'] = os.path.abspath( env['ARGS'].get('prefix', '') )
00056                 env.pprint('CYAN','** installation prefix for the project set to:',env['PREFIX'])
00057 
00058         # User-specified include paths
00059         env['EXTRAINCLUDES'] = env['ARGS'].get('extraincludes', None)
00060         if env['EXTRAINCLUDES']:
00061                 env['EXTRAINCLUDES'] = env['EXTRAINCLUDES'].split(':')
00062                 env.pprint('CYAN','** extra include paths for the project set to:',env['EXTRAINCLUDES'])
00063 
00064         # User-specified library search paths
00065         env['EXTRALIBS'] = env['ARGS'].get('extralibs', None)
00066         if env['EXTRALIBS']:
00067                 env['EXTRALIBS'] = env['EXTRALIBS'].split(':')
00068                 env.pprint('CYAN','** extra library search paths for the project set to:',env['EXTRALIBS'])
00069 
00070         ## no colors if user does not want them
00071         if os.environ.has_key('NOCOLORS'): env['NOCOLORS']=1
00072

00075 def dist(env):
00076         if not version: VERSION=os.popen("cat VERSION").read().rstrip()
00077         else: VERSION=version
00078         FOLDER  = appname+'-'+VERSION
00079         TMPFOLD = ".tmp"+FOLDER
00080         ARCHIVE = FOLDER+'.tar.bz2'
00081 
00082         ## check if the temporary directory already exists
00083         os.popen('rm -rf %s %s %s' % (FOLDER, TMPFOLD, ARCHIVE) )
00084 
00085         ## create a temporary directory
00086         startdir = os.getcwd()
00087 
00088         os.popen("mkdir -p "+TMPFOLD)   
00089         os.popen("cp -R * "+TMPFOLD)
00090         os.popen("mv "+TMPFOLD+" "+FOLDER)
00091 
00092         ## remove scons-local if it is unpacked
00093         os.popen("rm -rf %s/scons %s/sconsign %s/scons-local-0.96.1" % (FOLDER, FOLDER, FOLDER))
00094 
00095         ## remove our object files first
00096         os.popen("find %s -name \"cache\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00097         os.popen("find %s -name \"build\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00098         os.popen("find %s -name \"*.pyc\" | xargs rm -f " % FOLDER)
00099 
00100         ## CVS cleanup
00101         os.popen("find %s -name \"CVS\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00102         os.popen("find %s -name \".cvsignore\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00103 
00104         ## Subversion cleanup
00105         os.popen("find %s -name .svn -type d | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00106 
00107         ## GNU Arch cleanup
00108         os.popen("find %s -name \"{arch}\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00109         os.popen("find %s -name \".arch-i*\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00110 
00111         ## Create the tarball (coloured output)
00112         env.pprint('GREEN', 'Writing archive '+ARCHIVE)
00113         os.popen("tar cjf %s %s " % (ARCHIVE, FOLDER))
00114 
00115         ## Remove the temporary directory
00116         os.popen('rm -rf '+FOLDER)
00117         env.Exit(0)
00118 
00119 def distclean(env):
00120         ## Remove the cache directory
00121         import os, shutil
00122         if os.path.isdir(env['CACHEDIR']): shutil.rmtree(env['CACHEDIR'])
00123         os.popen("find . -name \"*.pyc\" | xargs rm -rf")
00124         env.Exit(0)
